text: A long-time associate of Santosh Sivan, he made his directorial debut in 2003 with Kurumbu, which did not fare well at the box office. However, his subsequent films, Arinthum Ariyamalum (2005), Pattiyal (2006), Billa (2007). == References == == Other Website == * Category:Indian movie directors
title: Vishnuvardhan (director)
